solution_line_template: If it takes Emma {emma_time} hours to run all around the two arenas, it takes Fernando {fernando_multiplier}*{emma_time} = <<{emma_time}*{fernando_multiplier}={fernando_time}>>{fernando_time} hours to run the same distance.
Together, they take a total of {fernando_time}+{emma_time} = <<{fernando_time}+{emma_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} hours to run all around the arenas.
